dict.acceptation: 替换；代替；把…放回原位；（用…）替换；

sent.orig: Check detector seals, and replace as necessary. Clean or replace detector jets as necessary.
sent.trans: 检查检测器密封垫，如有必要就替换。如有必要清洗或替换检测器喷嘴。

sent.orig: Bu sure to replace all four batteries at once. Replace with the same brand of batteries.
sent.trans: 必须同时一次替换4节电池，并采用同一牌号的电池。

sent.orig: Lists matches found by search and replace procedures are run in the Find and Replace window.
sent.trans: 列出从“查找和替换”窗口中运行的搜索和替换过程所找到的匹配项。

sent.orig: An automated testing tool does not replace manual testing, nor does it replace the test engineer.
sent.trans: 因此，对自动化测试保持适度的期望值很重要：工具不能取代手工测试，更不能代替测试工程师。

sent.orig: Can the information umbrella replace the nuclear umbrella replace the nuclear umbrella?
sent.trans: 信息伞是否能代替核武器伞？
